mapper.insert: insert into db_taskshop (SID, SHOPID, SHOP, FLAG, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, CREATETIME, CORPID, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, RESERVE9, RESERVE10, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4) values (#{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve6,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve7,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve8,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve9,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve10,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_taskshop set SHOPID = #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOP = #{shop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESERVE6 = #{reserve6,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESERVE7 = #{reserve7,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESERVE8 = #{reserve8,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESERVE9 = #{reserve9,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESERVE10 = #{reserve10,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SID, SHOPID, SHOP, FLAG, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, CREATETIME, CORPID, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, RESERVE9, RESERVE10, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4 from db_taskshop where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SID, SHOPID, SHOP, FLAG, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, CREATETIME, CORPID, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, RESERVE9, RESERVE10, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4 from db_taskshop
